info.title: Dispute File Upload
info.description: Upload and manage dispute evidence files for a dispute

properties.description: The unique identifier of the dispute file upload.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The unique identifier of the shop
properties.name: shop_id

properties.description: Size of the uploaded file in bytes
properties.name: file_size

properties.description: Mime file type of uploaded file
properties.name: file_type

properties.description: Uploaded file's original name when it was first submitted
properties.name: original_filename

properties.description: Uploaded file's new name in Shopify's system
properties.name: filename

properties.description: Unique identifier for the dispute evidence this file belongs to
properties.name: dispute_evidence_id

properties.description:
Type of evidence this file represents. It can be one of the following:
  • customer_signature_file
  • customer_communication_file
  • refund_policy_file
  • cancellation_policy_file
  • uncategorized_file
  • shipping_documentation_file
  • service_documentation_file
properties.name: dispute_evidence_type

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Upload dispute evidence files for a dispute.
